info.title: Recruitment System API
info.description: API documentation for the Recruitment System

parameters.name: job
parameters.description: ID of the job to apply for

400.description: Bad request (e.g., already applied, job closed)

get.summary: Get the current user's job applications

patch.summary: Update the status of a job application

get.summary: Get all applications for jobs posted by the current user
Get all applications for a specific job
Download the CV for a job application
Get a list of active jobs
Get jobs posted by the authenticated user
List posts for the authenticated user
List posts for a specific user

job_id.description: ID of the job applied for

user_id.description: ID of the user who posted the job
ID of the user who created the post
